headline: Apollo Weighs $9.5 Billion Stake in Seven & i Buyout
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Apollo Global Management Inc. is considering taking a substantial stake in a bid by Seven & i’s founding Ito family to take the Japanese convenience store operator private, people familiar with the matter said. headline: Apollo considering $9.5 billion investment in Seven & i buyout, Bloomberg says
summary: Apollo Global Management is considering investing as much as 1.5 trillion yen ($9.5 billion) in a management buyout of Japan's Seven & i Holdings, Bloomberg News said on Friday, citing several people with knowledge of the matter.  Under the plan, Seven & i's founding family will invest 500 billion yen in equity, trading company Itochu Corp will invest over 1 trillion yen in equity, and Apollo up to 1.5 trillion yen in preferred shares, according to the report.
